story:
Find Beauty Fast 

Belle Seek aims to solve a problem we've all experienced….getting botched beauty services because you don’t have enough time and information to properly research the person who is going to cut your hair, wax your eyebrows, do your makeup, or even perform your cosmetic procedure. You know what we mean, sweating bullets in that chair and praying you don’t come out worse than you came in. 

Those days are gone and we are proud to introduce Belle Seek, a new beauty services marketplace that allows you to search in precision and detail any type of beauty service based on the person who will perform the service on you. It’s a very robust  search and booking tool with some nice lipstick. 

Why We Need Your Help 

It's never easy asking for help but we have bootstrapped our way this far along and our funds are getting tight.  We are currently seeking seed funding (the big bucks from professional investors to take us to the next level) but we need a little more runway to make important fixes and enhancements to our site until we get our seed round going.  

We'll use the money donated towards:

  • Improving our mobile version of the site and updating critical bugs (bugs=things that are broken on a site)  that are keeping users from performing important tasks on the site with ease
  • Regular development and maintenance fees to keep the site running
  • Go to Market Campaigns/Customer Aquisition to get providers on board in our launch cities as well as make some noise to clients to begin using the site to book beauty services
  • NONE of the funds go towards any kind of salaries. We haven't been paid a dime and we don't plan to until our first round of financing occurs. Even then, it will be very little. 

    Photo: Search to your hearts desire by Price, Experience, Specialty, Deals,
    Even by your favorite Product Lines + more!

    The Impact And Our Mission

    We know there are so many causes you can contribute to but we believe this concept will change the way women (and men) book beauty services forever by allowing them to increase their chances of quickly finding the most qualified person to perform the service based on their personal style. The result is confident, happy and beautiful people.  Giving women the chance to feel amazing and confident, that is priceless to us. 

    It's also an incredible opportunity to support an industry that is primarily women and help them better position themselves and market their skills by building their own personal brand identity. 

What You Get, Some Cool Giveaways

As a thank you for your contributions we have some fun Perks set up based on the tier of donation you select. Choose from the ones on the right and enjoy!

1. Unisex or Women's Tee Belle Seek , rock it proud because you are the best!  

T-shirts may slightly differ than shown in photos. Tri-Blend American Apparel shirt. 


Risks & Challenges

As with any venture or business opportunity there are challenges and risks, to be very transparent with you we have outlined some of the major ones. 

  • Web development issues, unfortunately with custom software you can never tell what may go wrong when the system goes under stress and many users begin using the platform. However, with the funding we receive we will have a very qualified and dedicated team to quickly resolve issues with the site. 
  • Getting providers on board quickly in select launch markets, this is critical to our strategy since we can not have a site without the best professionals in specific markets, we need marketing funds to aquire the top pros in each city. 
Our team is fully qualified and with over 10yrs experience working on large scale web and ecommerce projects and digital marketing/merchandising campaigns. 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you are not able to contribute, no worries at all. There are some really important things you can do to help without making any financial contributions at all:

  • TELL YOUR FAVORITE BEAUTY PROVIDER!! We'll give them a FREE VIP Account,  email :  refer@belleseek.com  and mention Indiegogo
  • Get the word out and make some noise about Belle Seek
  • Share this with anyone who may be interested in contributing

And that's all there is to it.  Thanks Beautiful.

You know what we mean, sweating bullets in that chair and praying you don’t come out worse than you came in. 

Those days are gone and we are proud to introduce Belle Seek, a new beauty services marketplace that allows you to search in precision and detail any type of beauty service based on the person who will perform the service on you. It’s a very robust  search and booking tool with some nice lipstick. 
Why We Need Your Help  It's never easy asking for help but we have bootstrapped our way this far along and our funds are getting tight.  We are currently seeking seed funding (the big bucks from professional investors to take us to the next level) but we need a little more runway to make important fixes and enhancements to our site until we get our seed round going.  
We'll use the money donated towards:  Improving our mobile version of the site and updating critical bugs (bugs=things that are broken on a site)  that are keeping users from performing important tasks on the site with ease
Regular development and maintenance fees to keep the site running Go to Market Campaigns/Customer Aquisition to get providers on board in our launch cities as well as make some noise to clients to begin using the site to book beauty services NONE of the funds go towards any kind of salaries. We haven't been paid a dime and we don't plan to until our first round of financing occurs. Even then, it will be very little. 


Photo: Search to your hearts desire by Price, Experience, Specialty, Deals, Even by your favorite Product Lines + more!
The Impact And Our Mission
We know there are so many causes you can contribute to but we believe this concept will change the way women (and men) book beauty services forever by allowing them to increase their chances of quickly finding the most qualified person to perform the service based on their personal style. The result is confident, happy and beautiful people.  Giving women the chance to feel amazing and confident, that is priceless to us. 
It's also an incredible opportunity to support an industry that is primarily women and help them better position themselves and market their skills by building their own personal brand identity. 



What You Get, Some Cool Giveaways
As a thank you for your contributions we have some fun Perks set up based on the tier of donation you select. Choose from the ones on the right and enjoy!1. Unisex or Women's Tee Belle Seek , rock it proud because you are the best!  



T-shirts may slightly differ than shown in photos. Tri-Blend American Apparel shirt.    


Risks & Challenges

  As with any venture or business opportunity there are challenges and risks, to be very transparent with you we have outlined some of the major ones.   Web development issues, unfortunately with custom software you can never tell what may go wrong when the system goes under stress and many users begin using the platform. However, with the funding we receive we will have a very qualified and dedicated team to quickly resolve issues with the site.  Getting providers on board quickly in select launch markets, this is critical to our strategy since we can not have a site without the best professionals in specific markets, we need marketing funds to aquire the top pros in each city.  
Our team is fully qualified and with over 10yrs experience working on large scale web and ecommerce projects and digital marketing/merchandising campaigns.    Other Ways You Can Help If you are not able to contribute, no worries at all. There are some really important things you can do to help without making any financial contributions at all:  TELL YOUR FAVORITE BEAUTY PROVIDER!! We'll give them a FREE VIP Account,  email :  refer@belleseek.com  and mention Indiegogo
Get the word out and make some noise about Belle Seek Share this with anyone who may be interested in contributing   And that's all there is to it.  Thanks Beautiful.

story:
Short Summary

 

Archangel Armory LLC is a family owned and operated company, run by my wife and I. Our goal is to create affordable quality ammunition using state of the art methods and only the finest quality components.  All of our products will be 100% made in the USA using components sourced from US companies.

Funding will go to the purchasing the presses, dies, additional equipment, start up inventory of components, advertising, and miscellaneous start up costs.


What You Get 

We are offering several perks for those who assist us in getting started.

$10 Gets you a Limited Edition start up T-Shirt.  These will only be available to those who donate.

$20 Gets you the T-Shirt and $ 15.00 Gift Certificate for furture orders.

$50 Gets you the T-Shirt and  $ 45.00 Gift Certificate for future orders.

$100 Gets you the T-Shirt and $ 95.00 Gift Certificate for future orders.

$500 Gets you the T-Shirt and $ 450.00 Gift Certificate for future orders.

$1000 Gets you the T-Shirt and $ 995.00 Gift Certificate for future orders.


 All donors will receive their items within 30 days of the end of the campaign.
The Gift Certificates will NOT expire. You may use them at anytime you would like. As long as we are in business ALL Gift Certificates will be honored.
If we don't reach our funding goal we will still use what ever funds we receive to get Archangel Armory off the ground and flying.

The Impact

Our long term goal in 1 year is to move to a industrial building and in 5 years open a shooting range and retail store front.. Our focus will be to employ Veterans and be able to support local business and donate to local Schools, and many other local and national Charities.

  • Give back to those in the Community
  • Educate on  gun safety and additional training.
  • Make it real for people and build trust.

 

Risks & Challenges

 Before we have even started production. We have had to overcome several challenges.

  • Going in front of the City Zoning Board of Appeals to be able to produce out of our home and the out come was in our favor.
  • The Press. Working with the local newspaper and a local news channel doing interviews.

Even with these littles hurdles that we have come across we spread our wings and continue to fly. With your help we will soar to new heights.

Other Ways You Can Help

Spread the word and pass this on to others .

story:
We are Hands Producing Hope, a social enterprise with a heart for seeing families flourish, children fed and educated, women empowered and communities thriving! We need your help to grow our impact and start a program in Rwanda, specifically Nkombo Island.

For the past two years, our hearts have been steadily moved by the people of Nkombo Island. The island is home to nearly 20,000 refugees, displaced after the 1994 Rwandan genocide. It is estimated that over 80% of the island does not have a steady income. Most women are not able to read or write, as less than 25% of children go to school and, of these, almost none finish.

In addition to illiteracy, an issue these women face is the prevalent Congolese culture, which dictates a system where men believe they are kings and women their property. A man takes a woman (as young as 12-15 years old) and builds her a house. She is responsible for conceiving every year, providing all food and income, farming, transporting materials from Kamembe and other forms of manual labor. When these duties are not fulfilled to the man's expectations, the man finds another wife and builds her a house on the same land.

These women are so eager to rise above poverty and their current way of life. When women have the money to buy their own land, they are no longer responsible to the man, and they are free to take their children and leave.

That's where Hands Producing Hope comes in.

Over the past two years, Hands Producing Hope has been working in Costa Rica, developing relationships with a group of Guaymi Indigenous women in the remote village of Coppey Abajo and learning about their greatest needs. We have developed a program that touches the lives of a community that might not have otherwise experienced respect, dignity and hope for a brighter future:

  • 22 women have consistent, sustainable work that also allows them to stay at home and care for their children
  • Through our workshops, these women (along with their families) have planted and harvested their own flourishing gardens, learned the importance of personal hygiene, and began setting aside money for the future
  • 4 of the women received scholarships that allowed them to continue attending school - for one of them, even in her mid-thirties, she was able to fulfill her dream of going to high school

Through our program in Costa Rica, we have witnessed a community of lives changed and empowered. And we are just getting started!

We are ready to develop a program on Nkombo Island that will invest in the lives of the women on the island by offering education, employment and life skills workshops that will equip them with the tools necessary to rise above poverty and radically change the lives of these women & their children.

In order to make this happen, we need $20,000 to charter our Rwanda Program. Our goal is to secure funding to:

  • employ staff on the ground to personally oversee the program's development
  • offer consistent training to a group of women who will be our newest artisans
  • provide an allowance that will allow the women to attend training classes with their children instead of working in the fields
  • host a variety of life skills workshops to help equip these women
  • set aside for scholarships for the women and their children to attend school
  • purchase start-up supplies & place an initial order!

We have partnered with some pretty amazing people and organizations to bring you perks that are solely exclusive to our #HPHGoestoRwanda campaign! Pictured below are our physical product perks -- be sure to check out the full list of perks on the right for both physical product AND experience perks!

$15 - Napkin Set from Salila Rising - Fair Trade

Not only does this perk help us get our Rwanda program off the ground, but you are also empowering young women in India to stop the cycle of poverty and violence they have lived in for so long.  These Unique Napkins are made from handwoven cotton that is hand-block printed with vegetable dyes, then hand-cut and stitched into napkins. Set includes 4 napkins!

$25 - Hand Lettered Prints by Rosalynne Love

Receive two lovely hand lettered prints. Display them side by side or keep one for yourself and give another to a friend!! Who doesn't need a reminder to focus on LOVE above all else? This perk is available by itself and also in the Bronze, Silver, and Gold packages!

$30 - Hand Lettered Journal -Collaboration with Dot Products

We love products with multiple causes. Not only is this journal made in the USA, but it was made in collaboration with Dot Products, a school supply company changing lives for children in developing country by funding a day of school with every sale! Choose this perk and not only will you be funding education through Dot but you will be empowering a woman in Rwanda, helping her provide for her children and seek a better future for herself and her family! There are adventures to be had each day, pick up this journal and start documenting them!!

About the design: We chose the phrase "And So The Adventure Begins" because it perfectly embodied this next season for Hands Producing Hope. We are stepping out into this grand adventure -- exciting growth happening with our program in Costa Rica PLUS a new country, a new group of women and a new and growing tribe of supporters surrounding us! The mountains represent the stunning mountains in Costa Rica and Rwanda. We are excited you are on this adventure with us. 

$50 - Hand Lettered Flowy T-shirt by Rosalynne Love

Life is always taking us on some sort of adventure! Whether a new place, a new season of life, or a new job -- there are so many ways to find adventure all around you! Our women's flowy v-neck t-shirts are the perfect reminder of the adventure that awaits you each morning when you wake up! 

About the design: We chose the phrase "And So The Adventure Begins" because it perfectly embodied this next season for Hands Producing Hope. We are stepping out into this grand adventure -- exciting growth happening with our program in Costa Rica PLUS a new country, a new group of women and a new and growing tribe of supporters surrounding us! The mountains represent the stunning mountains in Costa Rica and Rwanda. We are excited you are on this adventure with us. 


$60 - Exclusive Early Release HPH Necklace

Possibly our favorite design yet and YOU are the first to see and own it! Our Radiance Necklace is handmade in Costa Rica by Yesenia and Xinia from seeds that were hand picked on the mountain sides of their village. The natural beauty of the seeds shine through in this necklace and we hope it is a reminder that you are perfectly and naturally radiant just the way you are. 

$75 - Bronze Package - HPH Necklace and Prints

Receive our exclusive early release Radiance Necklace along with two hand lettered prints! Three perfect Christmas gifts? I think yes. 

See above for photos!

$100 - Silver Package - Prints, Journal and T-Shirt! 

This is the hand lettered trifecta! Receive our two hand lettered prints, our journal for you to document all of lives adventures, and our flowy T to remind you that every day is an adventure! 

See above for photos!

$150 - Gold Package - HPH Necklace, Prints, Journal and T-Shirt!

Can't decide which product you like? Want to knock out Christmas presents for all of your children at once? Get it all with this perk! You will receive our exclusive early release Radiance Necklace, two hand lettered prints, our custom adventure journal from Dot Products, and our "And So The Adventure Begins" shirt from Rosalynne Love!

See above for photos!

$200 - Pen Pal Package

Receive all the items in the Gold Package PLUS one of our artisans will hand-write you a letter to you, which we will then translate and send to you along with a photo of her! That sounds like the best kind of snail mail to us. Keep your letter as a reminder of the impact you have made and will continue to make in her life through your donation. 

See above for photos! 

$500 - Rwanda Collection Access

Be one of few to receive exclusive updates on the progress and development of our upcoming Rwanda collection. You will have the opportunity to vote on designs and colors, and you will have early access to shop our Rwanda collection once it launches.

 Impact: Provide 3 months of salaries for 2 expert basket weavers to offer business and skills training to our artisans.

$1000 - Platinum Package

Receive a curated box of HPH favorites every quarter for a year! We will hand select a variety of HPH favorites along with some limited access colors for you to enjoy! 

But that's not it - you will also receive our slouchy "And so the Adventure Begins" shirt, our custom Dot Journal, two 5x7 prints that say "What is Done in Love is Done Well" and "Love More, Worry Less," AND our exclusive early-release necklace. See above for photos!

$5000 - Join us in Costa Rica!

You will have the opportunity to join us on a trip to Costa Rica. Enjoy the beauty of our artisans' village while living out community with our artisans. Get hands-on experience with a social enterprise, help lead workshops and be a part of our impact in Costa Rica. You will also have the opportunity to enjoy the natural beauty of the country and enjoy a day to simply be a tourist! Perk includes: all in country travel, food, lodging, small excursion and flight from New Orleans to Costa Rica. Trip date to be determined. 

$10,000 - Join us in Rwanda!

You will have the opportunity to join us on a trip to Rwanda. We are headed to Rwanda in Summer 2016 to meet with our new artisans and you will get to be a part of that journey! Get hands-on experience with a social enterprise, live out community on Nkombo Island and come back inspired. Perk includes: all in country travel, food, lodging, small excursion, and flight from New Orleans to Rwanda. 


If you are unable to contribute financially, we would still love for you to be involved. Help us spread the word by sharing about our campaign on social media and with your community!

story:
Why Wheely's in Copenhagen?

Wheely's are the anti-starbucks. Wheely's are much more environment friendly and support individual business owners and not big corporation. It is a full service ecological cafe. Along with the Wheely being solar powered, it also comes equip with it's very own greenhouse to grow it's own organic coffee.  In short, Wheelys are the first real challenge to the hegemony of the mega fast food giants.

I am extremely passionate about changing the way the world does business and how we are effecting the planet in return. I am an optimist and I believe the future is bright. It is small ideas like this that can make a huge impact on our lives and the planet. When you see a Wheely's and or purchase something you can have a feeling that you are helping a small family owned business that has a higher principal then the franchise across the street. This is the revolution of giving power back to people that will change the world for the better.  

What We Need & What You Get

Why 6,999? And where does that go? 

Well, that is the price tag of the Wheely's 3 science station as seen in video and pictures. I believe whole heartedly that this is great value. Most businesses take 3-5 years back to recoup their initial investment. On average a Wheely's station can make between 300-500 a day. In short it would potentially take about a month! 

Now if the goal of 6,999 is not reached the dream is not over! My smaller goal would be to raise 3799 for Wheely's 3 original. Which is still amazing but lacks the solar power and the greenhouse which I am a big fan of.

The Impact

Stop feeding the monster! I am not saying there is no need for big business, but shit has gotten out of hand! It is time for opportunities like this to be more available to the common man or woman. 

Also, know where your money is going. It is going to the family owned business you are handing over you money to. 

Feel good about leaving a miniature foot print on the environment 

Explain why your project is valuable to the contributor and to the world.

Risks & Challenges

People value your transparency. Be open and stand out by providing insight into the risks and obstacles you may face on the way to achieving your goal.

Risks? Challenges? 

Of course there are! Nothing comes so easy. You have to work for it! 

When I die everyone that has known me will agree on one thing. I am a hard worker, and I am persistent. I take pride in this. My Grandfather was like this, as is my Mother . He was a self made millionaire. Don't worry, I didn't get any of that money. He had 8 kids and died before I can remember. But I have his spirit. I have operated and failed at other businesses before. I am a grown business man with experience in such endeavours. Commitment comes from passion, and am passionate about change. Let's make it happen!

Other Ways You Can Help

If you would like to contribute, but can't financially that's ok. You can still get the word out. Share my campaign with the indiegogo tools :-)

I have operated and failed at other businesses before. I am a grown business man with experience in such endeavours. Commitment comes from passion, and am passionate about change. If you would like to contribute, but can't financially that's ok. You can still get the word out. Share my campaign with the indiegogo tools :-)

story:
Challenge Me to Eat Any Sandwich for Community Support

You Name the Sandwich and Price - I will eat it

  • 4 ingredients or less and it qualifies.
  • Must be safe to eat regardless of how crazy or disgusting it may be.
  • Photos and Videos of the sandwich being consumed will be uploaded for public view on Facebook.
It is All for Community Support and Fun for All.
here's why -  

Give a man a fish and he will eat for a day.  Teach a man to fish and he will…

…not eat unless he has a pole or net to fish with.

  • Not promoting giving your fish away. 
  • The homeless need shelter, the hungry need food, and the sick need access to healthcare.  This is common in all communities.  The immediate needs must be served with shelter, food, and healthcare BUT where does it stop?
  • Better yet, where should it START?

Education and Job Training

If you believe a good education and earned income leads to a more sustainable   prosperous community, then join me in assisting Shiloh Comprehensive Community Center in their efforts to educate our youth and help adults with job training and life skills. Shiloh Comprehensive Community Center, Inc. is a 501(c)3 not-for-profit organization serving many needs in the Augusta, Georgia community since 1977.  It operates from a facility on 15th Street that was originally used as an orphanage from 1902-1970.  Its outreach is far and wide.  

What I'm doing to earn your Community Support

  1. Each day, you will have the opportunity to challenge me to a sandwich on my Facebook page. You name the ingredients, no more than 4, via a comment to my post and Share the post.
  2. You place a bid in your comment (i.e. Peanut Butter, Pickles, Horseradish $7).
  3. The highest bid at 11:59PM, wins for that day.  Losing bids may be resubmitted the next day.
  4. I'll eat the winning bid sandwich the following day for lunch and upload a video immediately to Facebook and IndieGoGo. 
  5. You watch the video for entertainment and pay your winning bid via IndieGoGo. Then you Share the Facebook post with your friends.  Obviously, we'll accept donations from all whether you want to submit a challenge or not.
I DARE YOU TO CHALLENGE ME for #CommunitySupport

story:
About Us

Pets are a part of our family; I know that first-hand as I just celebrated the 20th birthday of my pHeline. I am the proud pet parent of Sweet Pea, whom I've had since 1995.There are no words to describe the joy she has brought me through the decades. Her companionship has been nothing short of life-changing.

I rescued Sweet Pea in 1995 from a pound when she was less than one month old. Had I not done that, one can only guess how her life would have turned out. Rescued animals -- and their selfless adopters -- have a special place in my heart and that has been a significant part of my inspiration for launching pHinicky pHeline.   


At pHinicky pHeline cat café, our goal is to foster pHenomenal experiences between patrons and our pHelines, which are available for adoption. We encourage and facilitate meaningful interactions with the goal of finding great, permanent homes for our pHour-legged pHurry pHriends. What also makes our café unique is our inclusion and particular focus, not only on our senior cats, but also on our senior citizens. We welcome and want everyone to enjoy the company of our cats, but we especially encourage senior citizens on a specific day to visit and to spend quality time with our mature pets. Undoubtedly, the companionship is comforting; the experience, priceless.


How A Cat Café Works   

A cat café is a themed establishment, the attraction of which is the company of cats. At pHinicky pHeline, guests will pay a cover fee (generally hourly) to enter the café and are able to enjoy refreshments and mingle while engaging with the cats.

Additionally, we plan to have a wine bar in the evening to further encourage patrons to spend quality time with our pHelines into the later hours of the day.

Guests will be able to book hourly reservations at the cat café (while walk-ins will be welcome, we anticipate a high demand for this wonderful experience). And should you fall in love with one of our pHelines (which we are hoping) and want to become a pet parent, your adoption will be handled solely by our animal rescue partner and its process. 


What It Takes

Needless to say, opening a cat café is costly, complicated and can take time when it's done the right way. But that is not deterring us from our goal. Currently, we are:

  1. engaged with the City of Alexandria/Alexandria to determine the right location.
  2. investigating the best possible partners/adoption entities that will supply our pHelines.
  3. exploring the regulations needed to have a combined cafe/wine bar in the company of cats.
The funds raised through our campaign are in addition to the investment that we are already making and will be put toward: leasing, licensing/permits, initial operating costs, etc. Please note that this campaign will not determine IF the cafe opens; it will simply help determine WHEN.

 

Perks

We have tremendous incentives to get you involved in our campaign! (Please see our rewards in the "perks" section.) ALL financial supporters will be acknowledged on the official pHinicky pHeline web site.

Risks & Challenges

Zoning/permitting, Department of Health requirements and overall logistics all provide challenges to this endeavor. But we are ardently staying the course to ensure all regulations and parameters are met in order to successfully open doors in 2016.


Other Ways You Can Help

While we know that everyone may not be a pHeline lover, we are SURE you know someone who would love to support an initiative that serves our seniors (both human and animal) and cat lovers alike. So, please share our campaign with anyone you believe would like to donate to such a worthwhile endeavor!

story:
Bloody Amazing Mary Mix
An Entrepreneurial Venture


It's amazing how far I have come with Bloody Amazing Mary Mix,
from its inception while employed as F&B manager at a golf course restaurant
to overseeing production runs.

 

Bloody Amazing is growing.  

Since Bloody Amazing Mary Mix's launch in April 2014,
feedback and reviews have been remarkable,
light-years beyond what I could have imagined.

Bloody Amazing now has a major distributor and is currently working
on a significant promotion opportunity with a very well known vodka brand. 

Bloody Amazing is currently distributed throughout the state of Georgia, 
and is reaching into neighboring states to expand distribution
to broaden product availability.  
We are excited that distribution interest has spawned in the northeast.

I foresee great opportunities and abundant growth ahead.

However, for Bloody Amazing to grow requires - ah yes, Capital. 

So this is why I have designed this page.   To raise capital to accomplish: 

  • Effective marketing campaigns to broaden Bloody Amazing's "pour" reach
  • Larger production runs, to continue to meet growing demand.
  • Printing of branded cartons - I have completed all the design work, just need to place the order for plates and printing - branded cartons look incredible when staked in retail locations! 

I am passionate about my mix.
I believe in it's potential.
And I know that with necessary capital - a much greater "pour" reach is attainable.  

It just takes two crucial components - Capital and Time

With the capital, Bloody Amazing can grow to a whole new level.

Thank you in advance for believing in and supporting Bloody Amazing Mary Mix. 


The Challenge

My biggest challenge currently - Capital.
With opportunities arising with distributors and beyond,
capital is necessary to meet growth needs.


You can help Bloody Amazing out further by:

                          *   Sharing this link
                          *   Telling friends, relatives, and countrymen just how good
                                Bloody Amazing Mary Mix is
                          *   Making all your Bloody Marys with Bloody Amazing Mary Mix

We want everyone to be able to enjoy
Bloody Amazing Mary Mix!

Cheers and Thank you for your Support
